attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We demand that any oil found in the Falkland’s and proceeds from these sales   be use to provide infrastructure which I define as housing, roads high speed rail links and costal defence. To aid the development of this country in the 21 century & reduce the national debt

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
